mapper.select: select * from (select @i:=@i+1 AS iterator , t.* from (SELECT board_no ,title ,hit_cnt ,reg_date, reg_id, reg_username, category, board_queue FROM board WHERE if(#{name} is null, del_check='N',del_check='N' and category=#{name}) ORDER BY board_no DESC,board_queue ASC ) as t,(SELECT @i:=0) AS foo) AS rowNumtbl WHERE rowNumtbl.iterator BETWEEN #{page}+1 AND #{page}+10
SELECT count(board_no) FROM board WHERE if(#{name} is null, del_check='N',del_check='N' and category=#{name})
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board( board_no ,title ,content ,hit_cnt ,del_check ,reg_date ,reg_id ,reg_username ,category ,board_queue ) VALUES( #{boardNo} ,#{title} ,#{content} ,0 ,default ,now() ,#{regId} ,#{regUsername} ,#{category} ,if(#{boardQueue} is null,0,#{boardQueue}) )
mapper.update: UPDATE board SET hit_cnt = IFNULL(hit_cnt, 0) + 1 WHERE board_no = #{boardNo} and board_queue=#{boardQueue}
